Text: When I try to unpack this with 7zip, it seems to be extracting to .mkv and says crc error, file broken. Any ideas anyone ?

Cancel that. Got winrar and it must have repaired it. Now playing in vlc player. Thought it would be unusual to get a bad upload from here. :D Keep up the good work, my wife is always wanting to watch 2 programs at the same time. You provide the perfect solution.
